SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client

Class Modification

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client.Modification
public class Modification extends Object
Represents a modification to an LDAP entry attribute.

Modifications are used with the LDAPSession.modify(java.lang.String, java.util.List<org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client.Modification>, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client.ModifyResultHandler) operation to change attribute values in directory entries.

Each modification specifies:

  • An operation type (add, delete, or replace)
  • An attribute name
  • Zero or more attribute values
Author:
Chris Burdess
See Also:
  • LDAPSession.modify(java.lang.String, java.util.List<org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client.Modification>, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client.ModifyResultHandler)

  • Constructor Details

    • Modification

      public Modification(Modification.Operation operation, String attributeName)
      Creates a modification with no values.

      This is typically used for delete operations to remove all values of an attribute.

      Parameters:
      operation - the modification operation
      attributeName - the attribute name

    • Modification

      public Modification(Modification.Operation operation, String attributeName, List<byte[]> values)
      Creates a modification with binary values.
      Parameters:
      operation - the modification operation
      attributeName - the attribute name
      values - the attribute values
